translations: n.涌出的液体，喷出的火舌；短时激增，迸发

phrs.translation: 生长陡增；生长突增；（经济）急剧增长

sentences.sentence: The water came out of the tap in spurts.
sentences.translation: 水急速地从水龙头里喷出来。

sentences.sentence: Babies get very hungry during growth spurts.
sentences.translation: 婴儿在猛长期间会很饿。

sentences.sentence: When the washing machine spurts out water at least we can mop it up.
sentences.translation: 洗衣机溅出水时，我们至少可以把水擦掉。
